account.description: [Optional] If set to 'all', return the balances of all accounts one by one; if set to 'current', return the balance of current account; if set as an account id, return the balance of that account.

subscribe.description: [Optional] If set to 1, will send updates whenever the balance changes.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
